dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge three masted ship is buffeted about on the choppy The ship's burly crew of SAILORS are SINGING lustily as t batten down hatches and adjust rigging. Some FISHERMEN ar hauling in nets at the sides of the boat and tossing fish barrels.

dialogues.speaker: IN MYSTERIOUS FATHOM'S BELOW...
dialogues.text: A FISHERMAN picks up a large MACKEREL from the net which suddenly squirms out of the fisherman's hands and drops b into the ocean

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We follow the mackerel as he SPLASHES down under the wate contrast to the turbulence. above, here it is quiet, calm peaceful. The frightened fish looks back up toward the wa surface and SHUDDERS,. shaking off the horror of his orde Then he takes off, swimming far away from the boat. Stirr ORCHESTRATION SWELLS and the TITLES BEGIN, as we follow t ‘mackerel.through a series of dazzling scenes of natural life; sweeping panoramas of graceful mauve anemones, myst WHALES, and the tiniest PILOT FISHES. Suddenly a MERMAN zips through the scene. Then we see a M and another MERMAN. The screen is filled with MER PEOPLE. follow the mackerel and the mer people as they enter a fa underwater city made up of numerous coral buildings decor with mussel shells and pearls. One gigantic structure sta out. A magnificent palace. The TITLES CONCLUDE as the mer people swim toward the palace.

dialogues.text: It would be different if this were the first time! **“ FLOUNDER (jumping in) B-but it wasn't her f-f-fault! Glut chased us and then this s-seagull was talking and... Ariel gives Flounder a sharp look. He quickly covers his realizing he has said too much.

dialogues.text: Seagull...? (realization) You. went up to the surface again, didn't -you?. DIDN'T You?

dialogues.text: Daddy, when you were younger, didn't you ever... _ TRITON . How many times have I warned you! The surface is dangerous! You could have been seen by a human barbarian!!

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: (shouting) The problem I'll tell you what the problem is, young lady! The problem is that I have six daughters who are proper Sea Princesses, who shoulder responsibility, who do what they're told, who make me proud to be their father... and then I have you... Ariel stiffens, visibly hurt by this remark. She lowers h head, trying to fight back her emotions. She looks back u ‘her father and is about to say something. TRITON (cont.) Not another word! And I am never to hear of you going to the surface again! Is that clear? Ariel is very upset. She turns away from Triton and quick exits. Flounder follows. Triton's anger dissipates and he turns helplessly to Sebastian. TRITON (cont.) Am I wrong, Sebastian? Do you “think I'm being too hard on her? Sebastian looks nervous. He is on the spot. He shrugs and forces a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your. Majesty... Ariel... she is still very young. Perhaps...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

He attempts to squeeze th a narrow crack but finds himself stuck. He pulls and tugs desperately,.then collapses in exhaustion, SEBASTIAN (cont.) (out of breath) Oh dis is just grand! dialogues.speaker: CONT'D

As he recovers, Sebastian l down, and sees he is holding a telescope in his claws. He it in horror, as if he were holding a piece of excrement. reels back into the opening. As he looks ‘inside, his eye wide and his mouth drops open in horror and disbelief. INT. GROTTO - SEBASTIAN'S P.O.V. A recessed area inside the grotto is overflowing with a fantastic assortment of artifacts from the human world. T inélude a lantern, an hourglass, gold vases, maps, musket ropes, nets, a sword, a trumpet, candles, a concertina, e The grotto spirals up high, and at the top, there is a na opening, through which the moon, reflected through the wa visible. ‘This creates a glistening light shining down on various objects. Ariel sadly removes her newfound collect from her pouch. She looks them over and caresses them wistfully.

dialogues.speaker: FLOUNDER

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL

. (whistles) Hey there, kiddo! Quite a show, eh? . Ariel looks’ up and sees Scuttle flying above her.

(CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: (excited) No, .look!.. He's breathing. oe Ariel leans in closer to Eric, stroking his hair. ARIEL (cont.) He's so beautiful... Completely enraptured, she SINGS to Eric. ARIEL (cont.)

Triton mulls this around in his mind. Then. gradually, he smiles, as if he rather likes the idea.

dialogues.text: sSéebastiangoes into a satisfied pose, as if he has indis made his point. He looks around for Ariel. SEBASTIAN (cont.) Ariel...? Ariel? (sighs forlornly) Ohhh... somebody got to nail dat girls fins to de floor... A sprightly MESSENGER SEAHORSE swims up to Sebastian. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.text: He wants to see you right away! Something about Ariel! A horrified expression of panic sweeps over Sebastian's f

dialogues.text: _(to himself) | He knows!

dialogues.text: Sebastian is -pacing:back and forth in a hallway directly the Sea King's chamber. He is preparing to go in. He isa nervous wreck.

dialogues.text: (to himself) Poor Ariel! What will he do to | her? What will he do to me?! 1 He'll fire me... dat's for sure! -.. No he won't fire me... He'll kill me! ... No... first he'll fire me, den he'll kilT ne...

dialogues.text: Sebastian 31.

dialogues.text: ..-peculiar...?

dialogues.text: You know... mooning about, daydreaming, singing to herself...You haven't noticed? shrugs helplessly,’ afraid to say anything. TRITON (cont.) (suppressing a smile) Sebastian, I know you've been keeping something from me.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (freezing) ...k-keeping someting...?

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: (leading him) About... Ariel...?

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (gulps) +e. Aviel...?

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: In... love...? There is a long pregnant pause. Then suddenly Sebastian h himself at the King's feet in a hysterical frenzy.

dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.text: Humans!! What about HUMANS?!! In an instant, Sebastian realizes the King didn't know. N he has let the cat out of the bag.

dialogues.text: (trying to cover) Humans? Who said anyting about humans... heh heh.. cur TO:

dialogues.text: Flounder, why can't you just tell me what this is all ab... As she turns the corner, she pulls up short. Her eyes lig up. A big smile comes over her face. ARIEL (cont.) Oh... Flounder... INT. GROTTO - ARIEL'S P.0O.V. The marble statue of Prince Eric has been placed among Ar other objects. ARIEL (cont.) Flounder, you're the best! She gives him a big hug. Then she swims up to the statue softly caresses it. (CONTINUED)

She LAUGHS and pirouettes, then freezes in mid action. Tr is standing at the grotto's entrance. He is red-faced wit anger. Sebastian is with him, looking very uneasy. Flound does a wild take when he sees the King and frantically hi behind -a :candelabra.

dialogues.text: (shocked) D-daddy!! Triton speaks in a soft, quiet voice. Almost a whisper. H words are measured and controlled.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: I consider myself a reasonable merman... I set certain rules... and I expect those rules to be sobeyed...

dialogues.text: But daddy I...

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: Daddy I.had to!

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: (building intensity) Contact between the human world and the mer world is strictly forbidden. You know that. Everyone knows that!

dialogues.text: He would have died!

dialogues.speaker: TRITON

dialogues.text: (shouting) Know him? I don't have to know him! They're all the same... spineless savage harpooning fisheaters incapable of any . feeling or...

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: (shouting) Daddy I love him! Triton stops cold. His eyes blaze.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: (shouting) No!!! . As the King yells, everything in the grotto RATTLES and S Glass SHATTERS. Sebastian winces. Triton paces the room i a rage. TRITON (cont.) Have you lost your senses completely! He's a human! You're a mermaid! You can never be together!

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: (almost in tears) I don't care! The King's fury builds to a tremendous intensity. Electri SPARKS shoot out of his trident.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: (shouting) So help me Ariel, I am going to ‘get through to you! And if this is ‘the only way... SO BE IT!!! Flounder dives for cover as Triton FIRES a bolt of energy the candelabra. It EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: (shouting) Stop it!!. Triton is furiously FIRING bolts of energy right and left his trident. One by one, Ariel's relics are destroyed in fury of activity. Ariel is almost hysterical as she watch her beloved objects DISINTEGRATE. Sebastian, and Flounder cower in fear. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: Finally Triton takes dead aim at the statue of Prince Eri

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.speaker: DADDY, NO

I've been banished forever. by your dear old Daddy. Reduced to living in this wretched hovel for all eternity! Ursula turns away from Ariel, gesturing plaintively. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ey)

(more) (CONTINUED)

Ariel sl PLOPS to the ground and SPLATTERS sand all over Sebastian shakes off the sand in a huff. : (CONTINUED)

dialogues.text: . (shouting) Max! Quiet Max! Here, boy! ANGLE ON ERIC . He is approaching in the distance. Max immediately stops barking and happily runs back to Eric, jumping up and dow licking his face. ERIC (cont.) What's gotten into you, fella? He stops short as he sees Ariel on the rocks. . ERIC (cont.) Oh... I see... . Eric approaches Ariel. She turns away from him, embarasse her hair is drenched and covered with seaweed and she loo tattered. Eric's manner is friendly and gentle. ERIC (cont.) I'm awfully sorry, miss... did this knucklehead scare you? He's harmless, “really. Sebastian timidly peeks out from Ariel's pocket. Max noti and goes for him. Sebastian does a take and ducks back in ERIC (cont.) Max, get down!! Stay... Max settles down, but won't take his eyes off that pocket notices Ariel's tattered condition. ERIC (cont.) Gee... you've really been through ‘something. Are you okay? Ariel nods and hesitantly takes Eric's hand as he helps h her feet. Eric stares at her intently, transfixed. There something he finds strangely compelling about her. “ERIC (cont.) (hopefully) . Do I... do I know you from somewhere? Have... have we ever met? Ariel opens her mouth to reply, forgetting she has lost h voice. Nothing comes out. She lowers her head. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.text: ERIC (cont.) You can't speak? Ariel, embarassed, shakes her head no. -Eric'’s hopeful s flickers out and his face sinks, disappointed. ERIC (cont.) Oh... Then... I guess we haven't met. (shaking it off) . Well the least I can do is make amends for this maniac here. c'mon... we'll get you fixed up. As Scuttle and Flounder watch from the distance, Eric, Ar and Max go off in the direction of Eric's palace. Ariel g at the palace in awe.

She stares in fascination at the glittering crystal chandeliers hanging from a towering ce the immense sculptures and paintings, rich carpets, huge fireplace, and a gigantic winding flight of stairs.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: +»-well I don't actually know her name. She doesn't speak.

They start washing the clothes, never notici poor Sebastian. .The crab is jolted back and forth as the the clothes around and plunge them in and out of the wate He gets scrubbed against the washboard, swallows a lot of and barely escapes going through the wringer. Finally Seb manages to crawl out of the vat and drops to the floor. H continuoulsly BELCHING up soap bubbles as he quickly make way out of the laundry room.

dialogues.text: Sebastian emerges into a vast, empty hallway. He shakes o the soap and BELCHES ‘some more bubbles.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN

A young MAID enters, carrying a tray of dishes. sees the crab, lets out an ear shattering SCREAM, and dro tray. The dishes break in a thundering CRASH. Sebastian a has a heart attack and scampers along the floor even more frantically. As the maid continues to SCREAM, Sebastian c up to the ledge of an open window and hurls himself out. EXT. ‘PALACE. ‘COURTYARD - DUSK Sebastian hits the ground hard. He recovers groggily, rub his head.

Some fish are on a counter. LOUIS, an overweight, exuberant Fr chef is sharpening knives to a razor's edge and boiling w to a frenzy.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (whispering) Oh... my... God!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grimsby is seated at a long table in a huge, expansive di hall. He is puffing on a pipe. Eric is staring glumly out window at the ocean.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMSBY
dialogues.text: Eric, be reasonable! Young ladies ' just don't go around rescuing , people in the middle of the ocean then flittering off into oblivion like some...

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: I'm telling you Grim, she was real! If only I could... Carlotta appears at the doorway. She is holding Ariel's h trying to pull her into view. Ariel is hanging back outsi the door.

dialogues.speaker: CARLOTTA
dialogues.text: Come on, honey! Don't be shy! Ariel enters the dining room. She has been bathed and cle up, she is wearing a very pretty dress, and her hair has fixed: Grimsby rises out of his seat, taken aback at the of Ariel. - (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: GRIMSBY
dialogues.text: Eric, isn't she a vision? Eric turns away from the window and looks at Ariel. He li up, impressed.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: Uh... you look very nice... Ariel beams.at Eric's attention. Eric looks uneasy. He is drawn to Ariel but wants to fight this impulse. He turns from Ariel and looks back out the window.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: Um... I'm sorry I'm really not very hungry. I think I'll skip dinner... : : (to Ariel) If... if you'll excuse me... Eric starts to leave. Ariel's face falls, disappointed. GRIMSBY . Eric! We have a guest! Now I insist you sit down and dine with us like a civilized human being! Eric shrugs and obediently sits down at the table. GRIMSBY (cont.) That's better. (to Ariel) You'll have to excuse him, my dear. His manners are on holiday, of late. Grimsby takes Ariel's hand and seats her next to him. Ari isn't:sure what to make of the elegant place setting in f of ‘her. *Her eyes go to the fork. This strikes a chord o recognition. She picks up the fork and starts running it through her hair, in the manner Scuttle showed her earlie She stops as she notices everyone staring at her strangel She quickly puts the fork back down on the table. Feeling awkward, she turns toward Grimsby. She stares, amazed at pipe in his mouth with smoke coming out of it. GRIMSBY (cont.) (uneasy) Uh... do you like it? It isa rather fine piece of work... He hands the pipe to Ariel. She examines it curiously, remembering the pipe Scuttle had used earlier. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: She puts the pipe in her mouth and BLOWS hard. Smoke and EXPLODE in Grimsby's face. Grimsby frowns, deadpan, his f covered with soot. Ariel wants to die. She is horribly embarassed. Eric CHUCKLES in spite of himself.

To Sebas the table becomes a gigantic obstacle course as he attemp weave his way across it without being seen. He quickly ru out from behind the wine bottle and darts. behind a bowl crean.

dialogues.speaker: GOD I LOVE LITTLE FISHIES, DON'T YOU

dialogues.speaker: SACRE BLEU, WHAT IS THIS

dialogues.text: Louis tosses. the terrified Sebastian into the boiling po Sebastian just barely manages to straddle the pot and lea plopping back on to the table. Louis What eez thees? Louis picks up. the crab shell and carefully peers inside Suddenly Sebastian shoots out and SNAPS Louis' nose hard. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: Louis YELPS. Sebastian drops back on the table and begins running around in a frenzy. Louis lunges for him but miss and his hand goes into a sizzling pan. Louis SCREAMS in p Louis picks up his cleaver and starts furiously CHOPPING Sebastian. The crab frantically dodges. Sebastian grabs a astry tube of cream, and SQUIRTS it in Louis' face. Sebas umps to the floor. Louis goes after him, tripping, bumpin into things, and knocking things over, in a wild, frantic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric, Grimsby, Ariel and Carlotta hear the SOUND of incre racket coming from the kitchen. They look at each other, perplexed. ‘CARLOTTA | I think I'd better go see what Louis is up to... She exits the dining room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carlotta enters the kitchen and reels back in shock. The is in shambles. ‘Food is strewn about. Pots and pans are knocked over. A disheveled Louis, maniacally brandishing cleaver, is crawling around on the floor under the table.

dialogues.speaker: LOUIS
dialogues.text: Come out you leetle peepsqueak and fight like a man!!

dialogues.speaker: CARLOTTA
dialogues.text: (shouting Louis!! . Louis reacts to her shouting and BUMPS his head on the ta CARLOTTA (cont.) What are you doing? LouIs Ah was just... um, er... I... I am sorree, madame... She shakes her head in exasperation, picks up a tray.of appetizers and whisks out of the room. Louis rubs his hea looking around the room in befuddlement.  58.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carlotta briskly enters the dining room and sets covered in front of Eric, Ariel, and Grimsby. Carlotta rushes bac the kitchen. Eric and Grimsby remove the covers from thei appetizers.

dialogues.speaker: GRIMSBY
dialogues.text: (slyly) You know Eric, perhaps our young guest might enjoy seeing some of the sights of the kingdom. Something in the way of a tour...?

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: (hesitating) ~ : Uh... Gee, Grim... I don't think so... I mean, really... I...

dialogues.speaker: GRIMSBY /
dialogues.text: You can't spend all your time moping about! . You need to get out! Do something! Have a life! Get your mind off...

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: (resigned) Okay, okay... I'll ask her... Ariel lifts the lid from her dish. She does a sharp "take she sees Sebastian hiding in the dish.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (whispering) Shhhhh...!! Eric turns to Ariel. She quickly lowers the lid to her di and smiles at hin.

dialogues.speaker: . ERIC
dialogues.text: (to Ariel) What do you say...? You want to humor this guy and let me give ‘you the grand tour of my kingdom tomorrow? Ariel nods enthusiastically.

dialogues.speaker: , GRIMSBY
dialogues.text: Wonderful! Now let's eat before Ss crab wanders off my plate! Ariel's dish jostles with a sharp CLINK. Eric and Grimsby over. She clamps her hand down firmly on the lid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariel, with a dreamy smile on her face, is leaning out he bedroom window overlooking the courtyard. We TRUCK DOWN a see she is watching Eric, in the courtyard, playing "fetc stick" with Max. Eric looks up and sees Ariel. He waves. Ariel, embarassed to be caught staring, quickly pulls awa the window. Eric smiles at her sudden departure and conti to watch her window for a moment.. But then his smile fad is replaced by a troubled look. He turns and stares sadly at the ocean. .

dialogues.text: Ariel, dressed in a nightgown, is warily climbing into a feather bed that has been made up for her.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: ..-Dis has to be, widout a doubt, de single most humiliating day of my life!

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: He is on a stand next to the bed. He is a gooey mess, sti covered with flour, sauce, and bits of lettuce. He is struggling, trying to clean himself off.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (fuming) Dat overstuffed barbarian! I'd like to marinate him! My mother never raise her little Sebastian to be an appetizer! (sighs) What did I tell you, Ariel... De human world... it's a nightmare!

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL AND SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: Ariel snuggles into the featherbed. This is a new experie for her, and she decides she rather likes it. She tries t pillow under her feet, then under her head.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: But would you listen to me? No... you just have to find dese tings out for yourself! _We move away from”Ariel and TRUCK IN close on Sebastian. SEBASTIAN (cont.) You only got two days left! How you gonna get dat boy to kiss you? (more) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: SEBASTIAN (Cont'd) He not even interested! I tink we ought to forget dis whole ting, catch de next tide home and... Sebastian turns and sees Ariel sound asleep on the bed wi contented smile on her face. Sebastian shakes his head, c up to her, and pulls her covers up snugly around her. SEBASTIAN (cont.) You are hopeless, child... You know dat? Completely hopeless...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The little messenger seahorse swims briskly in the direct of the palace. .

dialogues.text: The Sea King is swimming back and forth in front of his t He looks worried and upset. The mood of the scene is somb and brooding. The messenger fish enters the chamber. The looks at him hopefully.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: Any word...?

dialogues.speaker: MESSENGER
dialogues.text: No, Your Majesty... we've searched everywhere. We've found no trace of your daughter or Sebastian... Triton turns his back to the messenger and leans heavily throne. Silent. MESSENGER (cont.) Your Majesty...?

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: (hoarsely) Keep looking...

dialogues.speaker: MESSENGER
dialogues.text: Yes Sire... The messenger quickly exits. Triton slowly slumps into hi throne and buriés his head sorrowfully in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is a bright, sunny, beautiful morning. Ariel and Eric in'a colorful horsedrawn carriage departing the palace. G and Carlotta wave to them from the courtyard. Sebastian h in Ariel's pocket while Scuttle soars above them and Flou watches from the oceanfront, swimming to keep up.

dialogues.text: Eric and Ariel are touring Eric's quaint fairytale villag The carriage is moving at a rapid clip and the village is with activity. Ariel excitedly darts from window to windo not wanting to miss anything. She observes the picturesqu buildings and quaint shops. The food VENDORS with delicio fruits and pastries. The CHILDREN playing in the streét. all a wondrous new world to her, overflowing with things has never seen before. Eric watches her unbridled delight is amused and impressed by her.

dialogues.text: Ariel and Eric are riding in a small rowboat in a picture lagoon. The mood is quiet, peaceful and romantic. Eric is rowing. Ariel is sitting away from him on the other side the boat. They-both look nervous. Ariel examines her reflection in the water. She fiddles with her hair, tryin look more alluring. She glances over at Eric but he’ does seem to notice. She looks away, disappointed.

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE AND FLOUNDER
dialogues.text: They are anxiously watching from a distance.

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: Nothing's happening!

dialogues.speaker: FLOUNDER
dialogues.text: C-c-c-ome on! K-kiss her! Why don't you kiss her!

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: Two days gone and that boy ain't puckered up once! This calls for a little vocal romantic stimulation...

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL AND ERIC
dialogues.text: Scuttle flies into the scene, perches on a branch above A and Eric and starts CHIRPING loudly. He has a terrible si voice, shrill and grating. Eric looks around. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: (wincing) Boy... somebody should find that poor animal and put it out of its misery! Ariel look up at Scuttle.. The bird looks back down. and her a conspiratorial wink as if to say, "Just leave thing me." Ariel gestures to Scuttle, "No! Knock it off!" Sebas in Ariel's pocket, is covering his ears in agony.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (to himself) I am surrounded by amateurs! He rolls his eyes in exasperation and jumps off the rowbo the lagoon. Scuttle notices him, stops singing, and watch curiously. °

dialogues.speaker: LAGOON
dialogues.text: The lagoon is teeming with a vast assortment of colorful and sea creatures. Sebastian corrals them all together. H grabs a makeshift baton and starts leading the group into calypso-type, ROMANTIC SERENADE.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (under his breath) You want sometin' done you got to do it yourself... (to the creatures) First we got to create de mood. Percussion... (a rhythm starts) Winds... Strings... (more fish join in) Words... (sings) DERE YOU ‘SEE HER

dialogues.speaker: ABOVE WATER
dialogues.text: Eric looks around; confused.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: (to Ariel) Do you hear that? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: oN CONT'D: Ariel shrugs as if to say, "I didn't hear anything." Eric at Ariel. She looks radiant in the late afternoon sunligh He starts to move closer. She looks: up at him hopefully.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (to sea creatures) Sing with me now... (they join in)

dialogues.speaker: GO ON AN KISS DE GIRL
dialogues.text: Eric pulls back and resumes rowing. Ariel sinks back down ’ SEBASTIAN (cont.)

dialogues.speaker: HE GONNA MISS DE GIRL
dialogues.text: Fue] Eric ‘leans ‘toward Ariel again.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: You know... If you're gonna be staying around here... I'm gonna have to think of something to call you... : . (thinks a bit) Let's see... I could call you Marina because you came from the ocean...

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN IN WATER
dialogues.text: He rolls his eyes at the corniness of this.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC AND ARIEL
dialogues.text: ERIC (cont.) Or.maybe Sandra because we found you on a sandy beach... or. maybe... Exasperated, Sebastian pokes his head out of the water fo split second.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: (shouting in a whisper) Ariel!! Her.name is Ariel!!!

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: What was that? Ariel shakes her head. ERIC (cont.) I thought I heard the word Ariel... (to himself) Ariel... that's kind of pretty! Would you like me to call you Ariel? Ariel nods emphatically. ERIC (cont.) Okay... Ariel... The two smile at each other as Sebastian and the other cr resume the serenade.

dialogues.speaker: UNTIL YOU KISS DE GIRL

dialogues.speaker: YOU WANNA KISS DE GIRL
dialogues.text: Eric takes Ariel's hand and -looks deeply into her eyes. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: SEBASTIAN (cont. )

dialogues.speaker: YOU GOTTA KISS DE GIRL
dialogues.text: Eric slowly leans forward. He is about to kiss Ariel. She her animal friends light up hopefully. This could be it. is the moment Ariel's been waiting for. . SEBASTIAN (cont.)

dialogues.speaker: GO ON AND KISS
dialogues.text: The Prince leans in closer. Closer. But this causes the b to tip too far. Ariel is on the verge of falling out. Eri reaches for her, throwing things even more off balance. H tries to correct, but this starts a chain reaction culmin with the entire boat overturning. Eric and Ariel go SPLAS into the water. Eric ‘LAUGHS good naturedly but then he sees Ariel can't she flails around in the water. Eric swims over to her an grabs her.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: Hang on!... I've got you! Eric picks her up in his arms and carries her onto some r at the water's edge. Sebastian, Flounder and the other creatures deflate, disappointed the romantic mood has bee broken. As Eric looks at himself, soaking wet, it reminds him of ‘Shipwreck. He gets a strange look on his face. Ariel sen the change, and moves toward him with an expression that “What's wrong?" Eric turns away from her. ERIC (cont.) Ariel, we uh... we'd better get back. Eric climbs to his feet and helps her up, not looking at directly. _ *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are watching this scene from the distant marshes. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: — CONT'D: ANGLE ON ERIC AND ARIEL - WITCH'S P.O.V. We see a vision of Eric and Ariel leaving the lagoon in t Witch's shimmering pool of light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: URSULA

URSULA (cont. (vicious) Triton's daughter will be mine! And then I'll make him writhe! I'll see him wriggle like a worm on a hook! She scoops up a handful of the potion from the pool and s it. She SCREAMS and doubles up in agony. We see her silho transforming through the mist.

There is a layer of fog rolling in on the ho creating a somber, eerie atmosphere. Max is béside Eric, asleep. Eric looks up at Ariel's bedroom window. He sees silhouette pass by. He pauses for a moment. Then he turns looks out to sea again. He takes his fife, and sadly play few notes of Ariel's love song. He lets out a heavy SIGH, . unsure what to do. He looks back up at Ariel's window. cy Gradually, his expression changes from one of confusio aa resolve. He has made up his mind. (CONTINUED)

He hears Ariel's voice, SINGI her love song, "PART OF YOUR WORLD", just as it was sung when he was rescued. He looks out over the parapet. _ ANGLE ON THE BEACH ~- ERIC'S P.O.V. Through the fog, Eric can make out the silhouette of a ma walking along the beach. The maiden is SINGING the song.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: His eyes widen. He is entranced by the song. Mesmerized, starts down toward the maiden. .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is a bright, sunny morning. Scuttle is excitedly flyin toward the palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariel is asleep in her bed with a happy smile on her face is dreaming of romance with Eric. Sebastian is also aslee on the stand beside the bed, SNORING loudly. Scuttle swoo through the window and enters the bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: (shouting) Ariel! Wake up!! WAKE UP!!! Sebastian wakes up with a jolt in reaction to Scuttle's screaming. Scuttle flies over to Ariel and frantically pu -at.her clothes and her hair. She wakes up.groggily. SCUTTLE (cont.) I just heard the news! Songratalations, kiddo! We did t! Ariel stares at the seagull blankly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is dis idiot babbling about? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: _. (winking conspiratorily) Right! As if you two didn't know! The whole town's buzzin' about the Prince gettin' himself hitched this afternoon! Sebastian and Ariel.both look at each other, astonished. Scuttle shakes Ariel's hand.

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: You crazy kidders! Just wanted to wish you luck! Catch ya later... Wouldn't miss it! Scuttle takes off out the window leaving a perplexed Arie Sebastian. Ariel lights up hopefully. Could this. mean he dream might actually be coming true? Suddenly they hear E voice shouting from downstairs. .

dialogues.speaker: ERIC, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ariel! Ariel, come down here! - I've got something to tell you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariel beams, her heart leaping. She gives Sebastian a big grabs a robe and happily runs out the door. Sebastian hur after her.

dialogues.text: Ariel comes dashing down the long flight of stairs with a smile on her face. But then she stops dead in her tracks. is with a very beautiful, dark haired MAIDEN. Grimsby and Carlotta are standing toward the back of the room, lookin somber. As Eric speaks, there is something odd about his manner. He seems almost as if he were in a hypnotic tranc The maiden clings tightly to Eric.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: Ariel I... I'@ like you to meet Vanessa... She... saved my life a few weeks ago. I've been trying to find her ever since... The maiden smiles sweetly at Ariel. . Ariel draws back in and confusion. How can this be? Sebastian watches from th staircase. He is also perplexed. ERIC (cont.) We're... we're going to be married... on board ship at sea... this afternoon... (more) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: ERIC (Cont'd) at sunset. I... I want you to be there, Ariel... I... , Ariel is crushed. She shakes her head in disbelief. Her w world is collapsing around her. She looks over at Grimsby Carlotta. They are obviously distressed about the situati but there is nothing they. can do. . Angry and confused, to fight back her tears, she reels away from Eric and rac of the room. ERIC (cont.) Ariel... ? Eric starts after Ariel but the maiden gently pulls him b She kisses him sweetly. Unseen by anyone but the audience diabolical smile crosses her face. The.scarf around. her slips. slightly and. we see the nautilus shell, with Arie voice, hanging around her neck. :

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The brightly decorated wedding ship is departing the harb ‘It's passengers. include Eric and the maiden, Grimsby an Carlotta, Max, and the wedding party. The sun is looming brightly in the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariel is sitting on a platform on the dock, watching the ship depart in the distance. Her bare feet dangle in the She looks very sad and forlorn. Her heart is broken. Flou nuzzles up to Ariel in a comforting gesture. Sebastian le over to her, overcome with emotion. SEBASTIAN ° (on the brink of tears) What can I say{ Humans are slime! Dere is no doubt about it! Ariel forces a smile and gently pets Sebastian. Then, as looks wistfully at her reflection in the water, we hear a reprise of "Life Under the Sea" in a melancholy strain. S sees a school of fish swim by and seems lost in thought a the world she left behind. She gazes out at the departing wedding ship which is now just barely visible on the edge the horizon. She looks up at the sun. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: THE SUN
dialogues.text: It is low in the sky... Sunset is not far off. We hear th of Ursula reciting her conditions echoing in Ariel's mind URSULA (cont.) «+-before the sun sets on the third day... the third day... the third day...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -Scuttle is happily flying toward the wedding ship. He re puzzled, as he hears the sound of Ariel's SINGING, coming the ship. He flies down to investigate. The voice is eman from a porthole in the lower deck. Scuttle peers inside. INT. SHIP'S CABIN - SCUTTLE'S P.O.V. The maiden is alone in the cabin donning a beautiful wedd dress. She is singing a variation of the Witch's song "PO

dialogues.speaker: AND THE OCEAN WILL BE MINE...
dialogues.text: She LAUGHS as she passes in front of a mirror. Scuttle's widen. The reflection in the mirror is that of...

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: (gasps) The Sea Witch!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scuttle is completely flustered. He flies around in ten different directions at once.

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: Oh nol! She's gonna... Somebody's gotta... What am I gonna... I've gotta... (sereeches loudly)

dialogues.speaker: ARIELLLL
dialogues.text: Scuttle takes off, flying in a wild frenzy back to shore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariel is still with her friends sitting on the dock.

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: (screaming) Ariel!! They look up and see Scuttle circling overhead. Scuttle s them and crashlands on the dock next to Ariel. SCUTTLE (cont.) (out of breath) Ariel... the Prince... he's... he's not marrying you!!

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: We know dat, you dodo!

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: I... I was flying... looked in the porthole... I saw... I saw «ee I saw... I saw... I saw... Sebastian WHACKS the gull sharply on his beak.

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: -+.THE SEA WITCH!!! The Prince is marrying the Sea Witch in disguise! !. They all react in shock and surprise.

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: Are you sure about dis?

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: Have I ever been wrong? Ariel looks out to sea. The boat is just barely visible o -horizon.

dialogues.speaker: FLOUNDER
dialogues.text: Wh-what are we g-gonna do?! Sebastian looks around desperately. He spots a barrel tie a post. He SNAPS the rope with his claws. The barrel tumb into the ocean, floating on the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariel! Grab on to dat! Ariel jumps into the water, holding on to the barrel to s afloat. Sebastian dives in after her. He grabs the rope a thrusts it at Flounder. - (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: —™ a SEBASTIAN (cont.) Flounder! -Get her to dat boat as fast as your fins can carry youl! -

dialogues.speaker: FLOUNDER
dialogues.text: (nodding) Re-r-right! Flounder takes off, pulling the barrel, with Ariel on top the direction of the boat. .

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: I got to get de Sea King! He got to know "bout dis!

dialogues.speaker: SCUTTLE
dialogues.text: What about me?

dialogues.speaker: SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: You got to find some way to stall dat wedding! Sebastian swims off. Scuttle flies around nervously. a SCUTTLE Stall the wedding? How do I... What can I... Scuttle lights up as he gets an idea. He immediately flie emitting a strange CAWING,. horn-like sound that resemble military call to arms.

dialogues.speaker: THE SUN
dialogues.text: It is now beginning to set over the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the upper deck of ‘the ship, the wedding ceremony is beginning. The MINISTER, an extremely elderly gentleman, standing at a podium at the front of the ship. There is a deal of pomp and circumstance. Some buglers blow a FANFAR and everyone quiets down. A group of musicians begin a variation of a WEDDING MARCH. The maiden, looking resplendent in the beautiful wedding starts down the aisle. Eric follows, dressed to the hilt, with a slightly dazed look on his face. Grimsby, Eric's b man, walks in behind him. . Eric and the maiden take thei in front of the podiun.

dialogues.speaker: MINISTER
dialogues.text: (speaking very slowly and deliberately) We are... gathered... here today...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scuttle is soaring through the skies, SHRIEKING out his c to arms at a fever pitch.

dialogues.speaker: TURTLE
dialogues.text: A SEA TURTLE pokes his head out of the water.

dialogues.speaker: TURTLE
dialogues.text: Sounds like an emergency! Scuttle swoops down over the turtle, emitting his YELL. T turtle takes off after Scuttle.

dialogues.speaker: OTTERS
dialogues.text: Scuttle flies by a group of OTTERS, sunning themselves on When they hear his call they perk up, start clapping thei excitedly, and. dive into the water.

dialogues.speaker: BEACH
dialogues.text: Scuttle soars past a long beach crowded with sea creature They all respond to his call to action. Some LOBSTERS and STARFISH hurry into the water. A group of SEA GULLS all t off, flying in formation behind Scuttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flounder is. tiring.

dialogues.text: (out of breath) I... I can't do it... (CONTINUED)

She tries to g Flounder's attention, but can't make a sound. - FLOUNDER (cont.) This b-barrel is too heavy... Ariel yanks hard on the rope, turning Flounder's head jus Glut looms out of the water, mouth open wide. Flounder do a wild take as Glut SLAMS into them. Ariel is knocked off barrel, flailing in the water.

dialogues.text: The wedding ceremony is progressing. The maiden is gettin anxious, wishing the minister would pick up the pace. She at the sun. It is now halfway set.

dialogues.speaker: MINISTER
dialogues.text: (to Eric) «..Keep thee only unto her...so long as you both... shall live? Eric hesitates. The maiden looks in his eyes, compelling

dialogues.text: Ariel is desperately clutching the barrel while Glut, mou hungrily, moves in for the kill. Flounder knows he has to something. Then he gets an idea. He takes a big GULP and summons all his courage. As Glut closes in on Ariel, sudd Flounder shoots out of the water right in front of Glut's waving his fins and sticking out his tongue. Glut frowns angrily, turns away from Ariel, and starts chasing Flound Flounder .lures Glut through the loop of the rope to the Glut is lassoed by the rope. Flounder tears off after the Glut pursues Flounder, dragging Ariel along the water in process.

dialogues.speaker: THE SUN
dialogues.text: It is now barely visible over the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ceremony is continuing. ’ MINISTER ..-As long as you both shall live? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MAIDEN
dialogues.text: (with just a hint of arrogance) I do!

dialogues.text: Flounder, with Glut right behind him, approaches the ship Ariel quickly jumps off the barrel and grabs on to the ri She is exhausted and barely able to hang on. Glut stays o heels of Flounder. Flounder swims over toward the barrel. the first time, we see the word, "GUNPOWDER", painted on barrel. Flounder desperately shoves the barrel into Glut' mouth, then dives for cover. Glut is about to bite down o arrel.

dialogues.speaker: MINISTER
dialogues.text: (recovering) Uh... :where was I? Oh yes... {clears his throat) Then... by the power vested in me... I hereby... pronounce... you... man... and... Suddenly there is the sound of loud CAWING, echoing from Everyone looks up to see Scuttle and his batallion of sea invading the ceremony. People turn to the sides of the bo where an army of sea creatures, otters, turtles, lobsters have climbed up rope and rigging and are plopping on to t amidst the flabbergasted wedding party. They completely d the ceremony in a wild comic frenzy of activity. The animals zero in on the maiden bride. The sea gulls ar pulling her hair. Some lobsters snap at her tush. Enraged she angrily knocks them away.

dialogues.speaker: MAIDEN
dialogues.text: (shouting viciously) Get away from me you slimy ttle... . She realizes she has let down her guard and is no longer picture of sweetness and innocence. Eric looks at her strangely. Immediately she reassumes her former attitude clings to Eric. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: MAIDEN (cont.) (meekly) Oh Eric! Eric I'm frightened! Eric starts fighting off the creatures, defending his bri to-be. Scuttle realizes he's got to find some way to reve to Eric the true identity of the maiden. He gets an idea. flies down to the lower deck of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scuttle flies into the cabin and grabs the mirror off the It is heavy and he has difficulty maneuvering with it. He the cabin, carrying the mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scuttle emerges on to the upper deck clinging to the heav mirror. He starts toward the maiden. But just as Scuttle about to get the mirror into position, he SLAMS into a be drops the mirror. It SMASHES to the floor.: The maiden sm relieved. But then, as the Prince looks down toward the f his eyes open wide. The invasion of the sea creatures has caused the floor of the deck to be covered with water. Er can see the reflection of the maiden in the water. Only i not the maiden. It is the the Sea Witch. The shock breaks effect of the maiden's spell. Eric draws away from the ma in horror.

dialogues.text: Eric... what's wrong? The maiden reaches forward to embrace Eric. He pushes her Suddenly Grimsby points toward the opposite side of the b

dialogues.text: (shouting) Look! Everyone looks in the direction Grimsby is pointing. They GASP and then a HUSH comes over the crowd. Ariel has fina managed to climb on to the deck. She is soaked and bedrag and on the verge of collapse. She starts to faint. Eric r over to her.

dialogues.speaker: MAIDEN
dialogues.text: (shouting) -- Eric, get away from her! Eric embraces Ariel and cradles her in his arms. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: MAIDEN (cont.) Eric.., (in.Ursula's voice) Eric, stop!! Everyone reacts in shock as the maiden's youthful voice c to the low croaky voice of the Sea Witch. ‘he maiden quic covers her mouth with a reaction that says, "Did that com of me?" Eric looks deeply into Ariel's eyes. The emotions well up inside of him. He slowly leans forward, about to kiss her

dialogues.speaker: MAIDEN
dialogues.text: (in Witch's voice, screaming)

dialogues.speaker: THE SUN
dialogues.text: The last rays of sunlight disappear over the horizon. The reflection of the light on the water disappears.

dialogues.speaker: UPPER DECK
dialogues.text: Ariel can feel her body starting to change. She gets a pa look on her face and pulls away from Eric.

dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: MAIDEN
dialogues.text: (in Witch's voice, laughing) You're too late! You're too late!! Ariel frantically breaks away from Eric and dives into th -water, just.as the lower half of her body begins to glow magically and she changes back into a mermaid. Eric obser this transformation in wide eyed disbelief. The Witch's offscreen voice is CACKLING victoriously. Everyone turns look back in the direction of the maiden. They are horrif as the maiden transforms into the Sea Witch and dives int sea. . EXT. UNDERWATER . In a furious chase, the Witch pursues the little mermaid - the ocean depths. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: You can't get away, angelfish! You're mine now! Flotsam and Jetsam spring into view, swimming tailgunner fashion, on each side of the Witch.

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: (shouting) Flotsam! Jetsam! Get her!! Flotsam and Jetsam zoom after Ariel.

dialogues.text: Sebastian has rounded up the Sea King and the two of them racing to the rescue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric is in a small rowboat, frantically searching for Ari

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: (calling out) Ariel! ... Ariel, where are you? Suddenly Flounder springs out of the water and makes exci SQUEALING NOISES at Eric.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC, (CONT.)
dialogues.text: (startled) You... you know where she is? Flounder nods and SQUEALS emphatically. Eric follows Flou from the boat.. .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ariel, chased by Flotsam and Jetsam, ducks in and out of of coral reefs. The two eels are about to grab Ariel. Qui she uncorks a steam jet and dodges as the eels go sprayin of the scene. For a moment it looks like she, is in the c Suddenly, Flotsam and Jetsam spring up on each side of he She is surrounded. They close in. The only direction Arie can move is upward. ..She rapidly swims toward the surfac EXT. OCEAN'S’ SURFACE Ariel's head shoots out of the water. In the distance, Er and Flounder see her. Then Ariel is forcefully yanked bac into the water as Flotsam and Jetsam get their coils arou  oo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flotsam and Jetsam wrap themselves tightly around Ariel. is trapped, unable to move. The Sea Witch closes in on Ar Ariel struggles helplessly.

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: Tsk...tsk...tsk... Poor little Princess. Don't be frightened... (smiles deviously) It's not you I'm after. You're merely the bait! I've got a much bigger fish to... “Suddenly a BOLT of ENERGY fires past her.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ursula stop! Ursula whirls and sees Triton’ approaching with Sebastian him. He is pointing his trident at her. She smiles sardonically.

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: Why, King Triton! How are you? It's been such a long time, hasn't it? The King raises his trident.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: Let my daughter go!

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: -Kill me if you like! But I'11 take this little minnow with me! She's mine now! We made a deal... Ursula FLASHES Ariel's contract in front of Triton. He gl at it and angrily FIRES a bolt of energy full force at th contract. ‘The energy DISSIPATES leaving the contract int URSULA (cont.) (laughing) You see! It's all fair and square and completely unbreakable, even for you! The Sea King stops; immobile. Ursula turns to Ariel, but hesitates and looks slyly back at the Sea King. URSULA (cont.) ‘Course I always was a girl with an eye for a bargain... (more) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: dt

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: URSULA (Cont'd) The daughter of the great Sea King is ‘a very precious commodity... She saunters up toward the Sea King with a flirtatious at She playfully pinches his cheek. URSULA (cont.) ..-But I might be willing to make an exchange... For someone even better... ‘Sebastian gets a horrified look on his face as he realiz she is up to. Ariel realizes also. Ariel shakes her head vehemently as if to say "No, father! Don't do this!" She furiously struggles, in the grip of Flotsam and Jetsam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The waters are becoming more turbulent as Flounder and Er to reach the spot where they saw Ariel. There are ominous RUMBLES of THUNDER in the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ‘The Sea Witch..and the King are in the midst of working agreement. There is a heavy solemnity hanging over the proceedings.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: (measured) -.. You will agree that none of my daughters will be harmed in any way?

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: (anxious) Fine! Fine! I won't touch a hair on ‘their precious little noggins! Now, do we have a deal? The Sea King nods solemnly. Instantly, Ariel's contract rewrites itself, replacing Ariel's signature with Triton' As Ariel and Sebastian watch in horror, the Witch raises arms, preparing to perform.her snake spell on the Sea Kin The waters around them begin swirling, turning into whirl illuminated by bright FLASHES .of magical light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric's boat is bouncing on the turbulent-waves. Storm clo are forming in the night sky and the winds are accelerati (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: Eric looks down and can see the bright FLASHES of light b the water's surface. He grabs a harpoon from out of the b takes a deep breath and plunges into the water. -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the spot where Triton had been we see a glowing ball o magical light. The light dissipates revealing a hideous p writhing helplessly in the ground. Triton's crown and tri lay to its side. Ariel and Sebastian are aghast. Ursula p on the crown and picks up the trident.

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: (laughing hideously) Dear Triton! I hope you'll enjoy the garden as much as I!1l1 enjoy the palace!

dialogues.speaker: ERIC AND FLOUNDER
dialogues.text: Eric, grasping his harpoon, is holding his breath while t water. He sees Ursula LAUGHING in the distance beside Ari in the coils of Flotsam and Jetsam. He starts toward them

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: She turns and sees Eric.

dialogues.speaker: " URSULA
dialogues.text: Well, well... If it isn't lover boy! How perfect! Ursula smiles gleefully and points the trident at Eric. S FIRES a bolt of energy. He is just barely able to dodge i She HOWLS delightedly and FIRES several times in rapid succession. Eric keeps frantically dodging. Then he whirl raises up, and hurls his harpoon at Ursula. It grazes her shoulder. She grabs her arm, wincing in pain, then turns him, -enraged.

dialogues.speaker: URSULA
dialogues.text: (shouting) Why you little fool! Ursula FIRES a tremendous bolt. Once-again, Eric barely d as the rocks behind him EXPLODE. Eric is tiring. and runn out of breath. -He desperately tries to swim toward the’ of the water before he passes out. While the Triton polyp watches helplessly, Flotsam and Je let go of Ariel and take off after Eric. Sebastian and Fl jump into the fray, trying to help the Prince. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: As Ursula prepares to fire again, Ariel-leaps at her pull on the Witch's fins with all her strength. . Flotsam and Jetsam latch on to Eric and start pulling him down. Flounder and Sebastian battle the eels. Sebastian frantically SNAPS at them with his claws while Flounder g the eels a couple of sharp WHACKS in the head. The eels l loose of Eric. Ursula knocks Ariel away and prepares to take another bla Eric. Ariel SLAMS back into her and the shot goes awry, h Flotsam and Jetsam. The two eels SHRIEK as they instantly disintegrate. Now Ursula is consumed with rage. She takes after Eric as he approaches the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a violent storm with THUNDER, LIGHTNING, fierce and RAIN. Eric emerges near his boat, GASPING-for air. He hurls himself into the boat just as Ursula BURSTS out of water. Eric grabs another harpoon and prepares to thrust at the Witch. Ursula FIRES and the boat is hit, EXPLODING Eric is shot back into the water. His harpoon goes flying Ursula, insane with anger, moves in on the dazed Eric. Sh ~points ‘the trident and prepares to fire point blank at Ariel SLAMS into Ursula again and the trident is knocked of the Witch's grasp. Ursula violently slings Ariel into coral rock formation. Ariel hits her head hard and loses consciousness. Ursula, eyes blazing, reels back toward Eric. He is going the trident. He is about to grasp .it when Ursula furious leaps at him, smothering him in her fishy appendages. Whi Eric frantically struggles in her grasp, she viciously dr him back down into the drink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Sebastian tries to retrieve the trident, Ursula is simultaneously drowning and strangling Eric. She is consu with rage. Eric is near death, but with one last ditch bu of energy, he is able to wrench his arm free and grab the trident from Sebastian. He FIRES. The Witch is hit with a tremendous BOLT of ENERGY. She lets out a blaod curdling and slowly dissolves into dark, black foam. The only thin of her is the nautilus shell containing Ariel's voice, wh sinks toward the floor of the ocean. Eric passes out, completely drained. Sebastian and Flound go to him and help him back up toward the surface. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: NAUTILUS SHELL
dialogues.text: It HITS the ocean floor and breaks open, releasing the gl light of Ariel's voice.

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: She is sprawled on the ocean floor, groggily starting to to. The glowing light moves over to her and passes inside her. Her eyes widen and she touches her throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the death of the Witch is having a magical. effect everything under her control. The ground around her domai starts to VIBRATE. The whale's skeleton and pool of light CRUMBLE into dust. A magical GLOW passes over the garden polyps. They transform into happy, healthy mer folk again Even Harold is back to his old self.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A magical GLOWING LIGHT transforms the Triton polyp. Once he is back to his original regal forn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sebastian pulls Eric onto the edge of the beach. Flounder helps. Then Sebastian and Flounder quickly dive below the water's surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Triton and Ariel tightly embrace, overcome with emotion. Sebastian and Flounder swim over to then.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: (softly) It's allright, sweetheart... It's allright...

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: Oh, daddy! Daddy, I'm sorry! i love you so much! Sebastian and Flounder look at each other, amazed that Ar has gotten her voice back. Ariel warmly hugs her father, smiling happily. “But then, very gradually, her smile fad A sad look comes over her face as she remembers her lost Her gaze slowly drifts up toward the surface of the water DISSOLVE To:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eric is lying unconscious at the edge of the beach. He st to stir slightly. .

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: She is watching Eric longingly from a rock, out in the wa a short distance. from the beach. This scene parallels th earlier scene when Ariel had saved Eric's life and was wa him from the water.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON AND SEBASTIAN
dialogues.text: They surface and observe Ariel. Triton watches his daught then looks back toward Eric, the object of her heart's de Triton observes them for a long beat. He looks thoughtful He turns toward Sebastian.

dialogues.speaker: TRITON
dialogues.text: That... that human saved my life... . The Sea King SIGHS. He is on the verge of making a monume descision. He looks over at Sebastian with an attitude th says, “Should I?" Sebastian understands and nods pleading The Sea King looks back at his daughter and smiles. He ge ‘ana a magical glow comes out of his trident.

dialogues.speaker: ARIEL
dialogues.text: The magical glow engulfs Ariel, shimmering brightly.

dialogues.speaker: ERIC
dialogues.text: He shakes his head a bit. He is starting to regain consciousness. Suddenly he hears Ariel's voice SINGING.

dialogues.speaker: NOW WE CAN RUN
dialogues.text: NoW WE CAN STAY ALL DAY IN THE SUN Eric sees Ariel coming toward him, once again in human fo She kneels down beside him and takes his hand. The two em and kiss passionately. The camera TRUCKS IN tight on the kissing. :

dialogues.speaker: EXT. WEDDING SHIP DAY
dialogues.text: We pull back from the couple kissing and see that it is n wedding kiss aboard ship. The couple have just been prono man and wife. : , (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONT'D
dialogues.text: The entire wedding party aboard the ship, including Carlo and Sir Grimsby, are all APPLAUDING and CHEERING jubilant Max encircles them excitedly. Sebastian and Chef Louis, n the best of friends, are sitting beside each other happil swaying to the music. As the CAMERA continues PULLING BACK we see that surround the ship, in the water, are Ariel's father, sisters, Haro and other mer folk, Flounder, and other sea creatures. Sc is soaring above the ship. Everyone is APPLAUDING happily The fish are bouncing up and down on the water and CLAPPI their fins together. Back on ship, Sebastian's blissful smile fades as he look and sees Chef Louis coming right at him, brandishing a bi shiny knife. Sebastian's eyes roll into his head and he f as WHOOSH, the knife comes down. Pulling back, we see Lou has just cut a piece of wedding cake directly below Sebas perch. Sebastian recovers and smiles weakly as Louis offe some cake. Ariel tosses her bridal bouquet out into the ocean. Trito picks it up. He looks up at his daughter with an expressi of both happiness and sadness. She returns his look. Trit and all the sea characters wave to Ariel and Eric as the departs, moving against the horizon. We pull back to an e long shot as a stirring chorus does a final reprise of "P
